name: Neviem - Inky Prototype
description:
An original text adventure inspired loosely by DnD, in which you're on a quest to find the Star of Neviem, an item that grants its user a random number of wishes. Along the way you meet and befriend diverse group of allies in order to achieve your goal.

The game features a basic combat system, labyrinth exploration, and, of course, varied dialogue with each of the characters.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This is a prototype/demo version of sorts (for a future game of the same name) created in roughly 3 weeks intermittently for the purpose of Project 2 of DIG 2500 at UCF during the Spring 2020 semester.
The true form of this game will be more akin to a visual novel and possibly remade in an engine like Ren'py, but for this project of course it is a text adventure created with the Inky engine from Inkle studios.
If you would like to be updated on any progress made on this story in the future after this class is over, feel free to follow my art account on instagram @tired.jacs.art!
There's a work in progress illustration of one of the characters, Ara, right now if you're curious to see what they look like. 
Now, without further ado,
Enjoy!
